APP_BASE.description: Folder that contains your Heroku web server files

SERVER.description: Either 'Local' or 'Heroku'. Leave as 'Heroku' when deploying in Heroku, use 'Local' if running on localhost.

OAUTH_CALLBACK.description: This must be updated to include the name of the app. Replace 'REPLACE-ME' with the name of your app

OAUTH_LOGIN_URL.description: Salesforce org's 'My Domain' URL, provided on the 'instance' field

OAUTH_AUDIENCE.description: Salesforce's audience, either https://test.salesforce.com (sandbox, cratch org) or https://login.salesforce.com (production)

JWT_PRIVATE_JEY.description:
SSL/TLS Private key, escape new lines with '
'
